text: Jerzy Skarżyński (December 16, 1924, Krakow - January 7, 2004, Krakow) was Polish painter, theater and film stage designer, book illustrator and educator.Jerzy Skarżyński, by Łukasz Chmielewski, culture.pl,December 2013 ==Awards and decorations== * 2000: Commander's Cross of the Order of Polonia Restituta * During the Polish People's Republic times:Kto jest kim w Polsce 1984, Wyd. 1, Warszaw, Wydawnictwo Interpress, 1984, p. 873. ** ** Gold Cross of Merit ** Knight's Cross of the Order of Polonia Restituta ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Polish artists Category:Polish illustrators
title: Jerzy Skarżyński (artist)
